extendedInfo.description: Android version of the popular CPU identification tool for PC/Windows., CPU-Z is a free application that reports information about your device.- SoC (System On Chip) name, architecture, clock speed for each core ;- System information : device brand & model, screen resolution, RAM, storage.;- Battery information : level, status, temperature ;- Sensors.Requirements :- Android 2.2 and above (version 1.03 and +)Permissions :- INTERNET permission is required for the online validation (see notes below for more dÃ©tails about the validation process) Notes : Online Validation (version 1.04 and +)The validation allows to store the hardware specification of your Android device in a database. After the validation, the program opens your validation URL into your current internet browser. If you enter your e-mail address (optional), an e-mail with your validation link will be sent to you as a reminder.Settings screen and debug (version 1.03 and +)If CPU-Z closes abnormally (in case of bug), the settings screen will appear at the next run. You can use that screen to remove the main detection features of the application, and make it run.

reviews.title: My favourite app
reviews.comment: Its a surprise for me too see my favourite windows app in android platform... Wow... Really amazing... It accurately reads about my phone\'s hardware... Nice app... Love it...
reviews.author: Rajan Balamurugan

reviews.title: Detailed and lightweight information on device
reviews.comment: This is the one and only app I love to display the information on my device. It is very lightweight and shows all the devices sensors, processors, RAM, GPU and even battery temperature. Did I mention its detailed?
reviews.author: Dinesh Mathew

reviews.title: I like it.
reviews.comment: 1.04 runs flawlessly on my generic A13 tablet running ICS. Very detailed info, validation works well too.
reviews.author: Ezekial Jeansonne-Moore

reviews.title: Some widgets would be nice
reviews.comment: The information this app can collect is amazing. I really wish there were different widgets for it.  Clock speeds and available RAM would be a perfect one, for example.
reviews.author: Mike Zinkan

reviews.title: Battery hog
reviews.comment: Provides lots of useful info but it had to be uninstalled because it drains my battery even when it\'s not shown as running, which is something I haven\'t seen before.
reviews.author: Mark W

reviews.title: DPI IS WRONG
reviews.comment: I have galaxy s4 and it says my   dpi is 480 but it\'s 441
reviews.author: Naeem ur Rehman

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I use this app at my latop & then I use on my phone. This no ads, good (y). 5 star
reviews.author: Suwandi Liang

reviews.title: Reveals the truth!
reviews.comment: Great app! The specification stated on the box was 4GB internal storage and 512MB RAM (Starmobile ASTRA) but the real specification was revealed by the help of this app. This takes an explanation from Starmobile.
reviews.author: Kim Espra

reviews.title: Battery hog, wrong temperature report
reviews.comment: Phone still report high battery usage, most possible connected to sensors being avtivated. Worst of all: battery temperature reads 0 or even -1 celcius! Please work harder!
reviews.author: Hoang Lan Le

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Run great. Just love it. Only issue is sometimes it loads the setting while launching the app on Nexus 4. Is it a bug? Can you fix it.
reviews.author: rhishav phukan

reviews.title: Petty good...
reviews.comment: This is useful for a lot of things, but I\'ve noticed that the app is reading my CPU frequency and online cores wrong. Also it shows what frequencies the kernel allows, not the limits that are locked in. Everything else is great!
reviews.author: Joseph Lewis

reviews.title: knowing your device in very detail
reviews.comment: i love small effective apps like this 5*
reviews.author: Chae Tae Hee

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: This app has a lot of potential but for three catastrophic flaws: It does not cooperate with task manager/running in the background. Every time I try to reopen it from running in the background (I\'m tracking the temperature), it crashes. It also fails consistently to save my settings for the temperature reading. I\'m on the Fahrenheit system, I don\'t want to do math to guess. It also seems to have an issue running when I didn\'t actully open it. Way unstable. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Ariane Broome-Hopkins

reviews.title: Pefect
reviews.comment: This is very useful app to identify China phones
reviews.author: Syam Sly

reviews.title: Best Detailed
reviews.comment: I was amazed about the info it gave me, everything on the board that I needed to know was there , thanks ..I know the type of phone, chip, speed, cores that I have...thumbs up
reviews.author: Derick Ofori

reviews.title: Delivers what it says
reviews.comment: Best in system cpu and mobile platform
reviews.author: Mohammed Barzeen

reviews.title: Cool app, good to get an idea of my phone\'s specs
reviews.comment: Just wondering if the information for my display is correct? I\'m using a galaxy note 2 and it says that my screens dpi is 320 but I am sure that the dpi is actually lower than 300. Other than that it\'s a very cool app.
reviews.author: Klause Buchanowitz

reviews.title: Simple but really informative
reviews.comment: Thank you for this great app. The UI is very simple and I love it! However please fix that when you open the app, sometimes the settings page popped up.
reviews.author: Bundit Sp

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Works great, displays essential info
reviews.author: Ivan Gromov

reviews.title: A good starting
reviews.comment: Definitely a good starting of this CPU Z software on smartphone OS field. In CPU Z the storage of phone memory, emc or usb storage and external sd card storage should be shown properly and in a cool way. Hope CPU Z will be more efficient and cool looks near future. Thanks in Advance
reviews.author: Riyad Amin
